mapper.select: select p.* from ECX.permission p where p.permission_name like '%*%' union all select p.* from ECX.permission p where p.permission_name not like '%*%'
select distinct p.* from ECX.permission p
select p.* from ECX.permission p where permission_name like #{searchTerm} or description like #{searchTerm}
select p.* from ECX.permission p where p.permission_name = #{permissionName}
select count(1) as count from ECX.permission p where p.permission_name = #{permissionName}
mapper.update: update ECX.permission set description = #{description} where permission_name = #{permissionName}
